items.title: How to watch Friday’s streaming-exclusive NFL game live online for free—and without cable
items.description: This season's Taylor Swift-watch gets underway.

items.title: Is the Fed ready to go big? Analysts debate jumbo rate cut after soft jobs data
items.description: A half-point cut is “now in play,” some analysts say.

items.title: Paramount’s new CEO tells employees to return to office full-time or quit ahead of layoffs
items.description: Employees who don’t want to comply have until mid-September to take a buyout.

items.title: An Indiana lawyer named Mark Zuckerberg is suing Meta, saying his Facebook pages keep getting disabled because he was ‘impersonating a celebrity’
items.description: Despite Zuckerberg being locked out of his account for months at a time, Meta kept the $11,000 the lawyer spent on advertising for his firm, according...

items.title: Summer lovin’, put on blast: Can CEOs stop behaving badly?
items.description: Is it that CEOs are behaving more poorly or just that we just have greater means to catch them in the act?
